Package by.bsu.soroka.lab.common.service

Interface BasicService<T>

Type Parameters:
T - One of entities. See Product, Stock, Storage.
All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
ProductService, StockService, StorageService
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicServiceImpl, ProductServiceImpl, StockServiceImpl, StorageServiceImpl
public interface BasicService<T>
extends Remote
Author:
Soroka Egor Used to avoid cope repetition, describes basic data-access functions

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int add​(T t)
    Add entity t to data-storage.
    List<T> getAll()
    Returns all entities of BasicService from data-storage.
    boolean removeById​(int id)
    Remove entity from data-storage.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      List<T> getAll() throws ServiceException, RemoteException
      Returns all entities of BasicService from data-storage. Guaranteed, that return-type is Serializable
      Returns:
      all entities of BasicService
      Throws:
      ServiceException - thrown in case, of same logical errors.
      RemoteException - thrown in case of some connection errors.

    • add

      int add​(T t) throws ServiceException, RemoteException
      Add entity t to data-storage.
      Parameters:
      t - entity, that will be added.
      Returns:
      Identifier of newly added entity. See Identifiable
      Throws:
      ServiceException - thrown in case, of same logical errors.
      RemoteException - thrown in case of some connection errors.

    • removeById

      boolean removeById​(int id) throws ServiceException, RemoteException
      Remove entity from data-storage.
      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of entity, that will be removed. See Identifiable
      Returns:
      true in case, that entity was successfully removed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - thrown in case, of same logical errors.
      RemoteException - thrown in case of some connection errors.
